content.detailedDescription:
On sunday evening, oct. 6 at 9:00pm, my daughter and i were traveling west  on highway 40 over rabbit ears pass on my way home to steamboat springs area from denver. i had just rounded a corner into a straight-away near buffalo park trail road (there is a small dirt parking lot there that was empty) when i noticed two white lights straight ahead in the distance that i initially thought were venus and another dimmer star to the lower left. all of a sudden the lower white light began to descend and disappeared behind a stand of tall pine trees. it had an erratic path of descent and seemed to wave back and forth rather than just fall straight down.

just as the smaller white light disappeared, i saw the larger light that i thought was venus begin to grow as it approached rather quickly. at this point i told my daughter to look up and she immediately saw the object as it sped towards us. the growing round white light developed a red border that transitioned in to a solid red red light. as the object approached, i noticed that there was also a blinking light behind it but am not sure if this blinking light was white or red. a very short bright green line had also appeared just below and to the immediate left of the solid red light. the object then slowed and swerved to the right (north) towards our truck. when the object was positioned just to the left in front of us, it dropped in elevation and began to slowly pass overhead.

as the object slowly moved above us, we could see that the short green line was actually a long flat bright rectangular strip. from the new overhead perspective, this strip extended just a bit in front of the solid red light and stretched quite a bit behind it. my daughter and i both remarked about how crisp and clear the green box angles were and how there was no glow given how bright the green light was. i have previously worked with low powered lasers (<100mw), and would say the green color was exactly at 532nm. there seemed to be some glow from the red light and flashing light in the rear, but we were unable to see any reflections on a craft body or wing/propeller parts--all we could see were the lights. not sure if there was a sound.

initially i was unsure of the object's size. as the object was flying towards us, i thought it might be something small like a drone or rc airplane/helicopter because it arrived so fast and its flight path had such quick but smooth directional changes. however, once it was above us, the object slowed considerably--almost to a hover, and we were able to see it clearly before passing underneath. i was traveling between 70-65 mph, so anything small should have zipped right over us. once the object passed out of view above our windshield, we were unable to see it again out the back window or rearview mirrors. my daughter did not want to stop and get a better look.

i would love to know what your group might think this was, because i have never seen a solid object emit such a bright green light
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green and red object dropped white light then approached

content.detailedDescription: My lady and i were camping off the kangamangus highway at the blackberry crossing campsite on the eastern end of the highway. we were in sleeping bags under the stars, no tent.Something woke me up around 3am and right above our heads just above the treeline was a craft moving very slowly from left to right.The treetops were in a circular shape and one third of this craft blocked out the stars. as it slowly moved to the right i saw red and white lights on what seemed like the side of the ship. i could not make out the shape of it.As the rear of the craft passed over us i noticed the rear was lit up. it was sort of oval shaped and  it was very bright and the orange-yellow colors in this oval seemed to move or flicker.After it passed beyond the treeline and out of our sight,i got out of the sleeping bag and ran down a footpath in the same direction as the craft but saw nothing .The whole episode took about a minute or so.It was almost 40 years ago but i remember that minute or so like it was yesterday.One more thing, when i say it was moving slow above the treeline ,it was going no faster than a person taking a very, very slow walk. the humming i mentioned was weird, you could almost feel it as well as hear it.  i spent some time in u.S. air force. i have been around b-52s, b-47s and some fighters of the time ande we had nothing that i know of that could travel almost silently at treetop level going 2 or 3 mph. i will never forget that night.
content.summary: Sleeping at a campsite ,i woke up to see a craft right above the treeline right over our heads moving very slowly from left to right.

content.detailedDescription: Out walking my dog, noticed what i thought was a very bright star, went inside to get my golf scope so i could see what it was, after getting a better look i got very excited so i went inside to get my wife so she too could see what i was seeing...She was not convinced it was a ufo but i stood there and watched the lights pulsate and then...It was gone!!! after about 20 minutes, it just poof, disappeared!!
content.summary: Craft hovered, lights pulsated and then it just disappeared within a blink of the eye.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of 7/21st 2013 12:05 am i witnessed the most hugest ufo it is triangle 3 lights and huge almost or is as big as a small town. what worries me is it just hung there in a flight path why?
content.summary: Giant ufo  in flight path  3 circles ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was outside enjoying a cold front that had blown in looking at the stars when i noticed three lights in a formation like a triangle not very bright a dull white color i thought the were some birds at first but they weren't it moved fast made no noise, flew  straight then did a uturn then an l turn speed seemed constant. i wanted to grab my camera but it was moving fast and only had 30-45 sec to view before i lost sight of it due to distance  i'm glad i viewed it for as long as i could without distraction. my feelings were that it was a very curious site to see. i star gaze almost every night and have never seen anything like it or move like it did. after i lost site i texted my friends and family and went online to see if anyone else had reported the shape and characteristics of what i saw i'd never heard of this shape before but it seems to be somewhat common
content.summary: Three lights, not bright shaped like a triangle,big fast no noise  did a uturn

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home little after 7pm and saw a group of people taking pictures of the sky, i looked up and saw what looked like a what a typical ufo looks like shape wise. i pulled over and it was apparent it was definitely not a plane or chopper and not man made. then the 1 light turned to 3 possibly 4 distinct lights and was dropping small lights or orb like things that vanished or disintegrated shortly after leaving the craft. it was slow and steady no blinking or speed change. the lights all went out several times and came back on. i took pics with the iphone and at 1st they look like a ball of light but when zoomed clearly shows 3 separate lights. should've tracked down the other people that saw it!
content.summary: Ufo seen over walnut creek

content.detailedDescription: A friend alerted me to a strange-looking glowing object moving from our left as we faced south at about 12:30 a.M. on october 5th, 2013. it moved silently and pulsed a reddish-orange-amber light. i thought it may have been a plane, but it had no blinking lights...It just glowed. my second thought was that it might be a meteor. my friend and i both asked each other repeatedly what the f it might be. we became a little excited and watched it until it disappeared out of sight. it was not visible from the rear, only the side or the bottom, whatever part we were seeing. not a sound.
content.summary: Silently traveling out of the east, glowing and pulsing. traveling wnw disappearing out of sight after about a minute.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were returning from newport beach, ca down pacific coast highway 1 and between newport beach, ca and north laguna beach, ca, my mother observed what looked like an oil driller platform (there are three of them about 10 miles or more north towards huntington beach, ca or long beach, ca. and earlier on the way up to newport beach, ca we were looking out towards catalina island and there was a layer of haze or smog and the mountain tops of catalina were only visable), but as my mom told me to look out over the coast and out toward the ocean to the left about 3 degrees to the left from catalina island and directly as high as the island mountains elevation wise, there was a horizontal platform with nothing under it , my eyes adjusted for about 5 seconds then my brother saw it and noted that it was disturbing the ocean water underneath like a helicopter or a hover craft(which i've seen down in oceanside ,ca marine corps/navy often operate those off the coast) but this was at the same height as the catalina island mountain tops and seemed miles away from me and was bigger than any helicopter or airliner, so 20 seconds after i first saw it from left to right, it disappeared but wasn't instantanious it took a sec and half to disappear(like a windshield wiper), then it was gone for about 15 seconds then reappeared left to right again. at first i thought it was a oil drilling platform thats how far and big it was, then i thought it was a helicopter cause it was hundreds of feet off the ground and was affecting the water below it, like a helicopter(i could see white wash under it, like high winds), then i thought it was a hover craft but it was too far off the ground, and i thought when it disappeared from left to right i thought the helicopter was hovering and rotating and when it disappeared, that was when it was facing me. but after about a minute and 50 seconds all together it disappeared and was never seen again the whole way home. whatever it was, it was big, far away, and wasn't a helicopter or hovercraft, and was bigger than any yacht or sail boat i've ever seen but it was also off the ground and hovering didn't move at all but i was in a moving car so maybe, but i didn't see it move, just disappear, then reappear, then disappear again and it was gone the white wash under it was gone, and my whole family was dumbfounded...3 of my family saw it the driver didn't get to see it but when i described it to him he said thats not a helicopter or boat or hover craft. it looked cigar shaped, really long and narrow like a platform.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object hundreds ft off ground water under was visually effected, next to catalina island

content.detailedDescription: Three distinct dots in the sky dancing about for 15 minutes until obscured by mist. looked like distant stars. nothing different than tiny stars except rapid movement.  about 20 degrees above the horizon.  i was looking out of my window and noticed them.  they were not there when i was looking out of my window 5 minutes before. noticed 2:45 am.  zoomed upwards at high speed to 45 degrees from horizon in one second and then moved left and right repeatedly by about three cm if taken one foot from my face, then dropped rapidly.  first two and then a third.  the two seemed to be roughly the same distance apart at first, then moved apart.  3am, continuing to watch.  still moving rapidly across the sky.  nasa desk and petersen afb desk closed due to us government shutdown. not good job guys.
content.summary: Three dots in the sky dancing about

content.detailedDescription: This all began three or so months ago,we noticed these large things in the sky with red,bluish green,amber lights going around just sitting out there sometimes 4 sometimes 8 we would watch them through binoculars,one night i flashed a flash light at them 3at a time then an orange reddish orb flew past me,then a couple of weeks later a white orb came past me,this is perplexing and we can not explain it,as i am writing this they are sitting out in the sky. [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Large lights going around 8 of them in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen this object for months. always in the southwest sky.It appears at first glance to be a very bright star. you could think it was venus. this object hovers for 20 minutes , then it moves. it is under the cloud cover and descends in front of the mountain range, mountain range.
on this particular night, it changed shapes . it was round then changed into an oval . it pulsed and emitted light.
i had two friends who witnessed it from a different location.
content.summary: Object that appears to be a star on first glance.

content.detailedDescription: Eight of us were sitting around a fire enjoying beverages and good company when i noticed what i thought was a bright ember from the fire through the trees.  my back was facing south so this object was coming from a northern direction.  i then realized it was moving north to south so i asked the two women next two me if that was a plane moving in the sky.  they thought it was but we quickly changed our opinions when the object came into view out of the trees.  the object was moving at about the rate of a plane and was directly overhead when i noticed another similar object through the trees following right behind.  the first object continued to move in a north to south flight path when the second object seemed to speed up and catch the first but still keeping a distance of no more than 100 or 200 feet in the sky.  as soon as they were about that distance away from each other they stopped and hovered in the sky...That's when we knew we were witnessing something other worldly or classified.  at that point these two objects got dimmer and dimmer and then just disappeared...The whole time staying stationary in the sky. then someone in the group noticed a third object, again traveling in a north to south fashion in the sky.  this object appeared to be similar just a little more brilliant orange and red than the first two.  this is the object that we finally caught on an iphone camera and watched as it traveled and stopped then seemed to dim and disappear in the same manner.  i have been watching the skies all my life, and never have seen anything like this.  you may think you see something and then logical explanations will surface.  all eight of us could not come up with a logical explanation for what we all saw last night.
content.summary: Two objects appeared out of northern sky and hovered then disappeared...A third appeard on same path then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Playing ball with grandson  in hebron, in and looked up to track ball,noticed object traveling due north. though might be aircraft but studied for a minute but could not see wing or tail sections. straight line and no alt change or sound.  finally saw ufo ,try to look at sky as much as possible with positive results. lost site as it headed due north at about 30* above horizon.  aircraft usually nw or se direction/ 2 to 3 min total time
content.summary: Cylinder,gray/white,dark, blk lines on long axis,no wings or tail section,no sound, 5k ft above wispy clds, comm airfraft usually nw to se direction ,no wing or tail, had crinkly syrface with dark sharp lines on long axis  .           ds,

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving to pick up my oldest daughter for work and on my way to my car i saw a blinking light red and blue my youngest daughter said mom the plane isn't moving so i said it could be a star so we paid it no mind and left. when we arrived at my daughter job we noticed that there was a bright light on the left side of my car it was oct 5,2013 at 8:16pm we waited for my daughter to get off for 15min and in those 15 min that thing didn't move. i took a picture of it and zoomed in it on my cell and i saw it wasn't a plane it was a ufo.
content.summary: Ufo in louisiana

content.detailedDescription: Last night, around 8:30 my wife, myself and daughter in law, were standing outside watching what appeared to be a satellite making its way from the south sky to the north, when all three of us at the same time saw out of our peripheral what first appeared as a circular grouping of birds surrounded in a fog, flying very fast. within seconds it was obvious they weren't birds as we all noticed the circular formation was pretty much a near perfect grid with a few around the sides that  kept it from being a perfect circle.  in no more than 10 seconds at very low altitude, the cluster flawlessly formed a v shape, and then again, flawlessly went into a straight line (side by side) formation, all at very high speed, and all silently of course. our "low altitude" field of view, staring straight up with obstructions was approximately 1-2 miles. i would guess 600 mph or greater at no more than a few thousand feet. we all agree that they weren't really lit up, but more like reflections of horizon and ground light. almost transparent looking. i was obviously amazed and at the same time very disturbed at what we saw. basically this "other worldly" synchronized night formation flying was a display of power and precision beyond a critical thinkers comprehension. made me realize in that moment we are no match for what flew over. magnificent and frightening all in a few seconds. i would consider this one a life altering event. holy smokes!! or as in all our words last night "wtf was that!!!"
content.summary: Multiple object flyover

content.detailedDescription: Anyone else see this strange phenomena in garland texas today? my husband was in the backyard doing yard work and hollered at me to hurry up and get outside. i looked up in the sky to see what he witnessed. it was round in shape but moving throughout the circle like jelly or birds all huddled together but not huddled because you could see spacing between the inner cylindrical units. they were white pink bright in color. we moved from the back yard gate not 2 feet to the drive way and looked back up and they were gone. they were so high in the sky. we then saw a few surface and leave again. a few minutes later i saw a flash like a spot light in the sky moving like you would see one of those advertising lights move. we saw two more shoot across the sky and have not seen anything since. we were in our driveway and noticed the garage door was opened slightly, which we do on occasion. my husband began entering numbers on the keypad to close it. it takes a series of four numbers. he hit one the door closed and then the door came up.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange sighting in sky near my home

content.detailedDescription: White rectangular object over co front range ~20 degrees wsw of centennial co; impression similar to viewing the driver's side of an 18-wheel box except with curved right & left ends. though *much* larger since it was viewed from appx 11 miles and clearly silhouetted against a mountain ridge. oddly, it threw a white reflection below and behind rather than a shadow. took two cell phone photos, and returned 45 minutes later with a nikon w/ zoom lens to capture a better photo; however at that time it was no longer visible.  date/time: oct 2, 2013, 2:42pm. can provide precise viewing location to within 1 foot, and object location within several meters since i took reliable (experienced) mountaineering alignments.
content.summary: White object over co front range

content.detailedDescription: I was my family was driving to a camp sit.My sister. a plan. it just followed us. exited and after i said look a ufo.I looked away and look back and it was gone.
content.summary: White and looked like it was following us.

content.detailedDescription: Since 2012,i have notice several brightly colored round objects from the back of my deck,starting about june of 2012,most recently starting about jan 2013,the number of these objects have increased rom 1-2 to as many as 4-5.They appear out of no where below the line of star up above,it starts as a faint dim light and develops into a round pulsating ball of light of flashing red lights on the top,bright white gold light in the middle with green,blue on the bottom.With binoculars,the lights appear to spin,dip and dive  and make sharp sudden turns in a holding pattern,with the binoculars,the lights seems to be still.On oct.3.2013, a large huge bright light froms in the sw sky and hoovers at about 7:45pm,the other flashing round objects seems to form at different time frames.The bright light fades in brightness at about 9:15pm,begins to pulse in the colors of red on the top,gold in the center with blue-green on the bottom,and fades to blackness by 9:20pm.The other lights begin to also fade in brightness and are all gone by 10pm.Ther has been an episode in 2012,when a huge basketbakk size orange glowing light appeared thur the trees and popped otout above the the tops of the tres and hoover for a few minutes and floated across the sky toward the east and disappeared.I had no idea as to what the objects were,maybe a star,but i was able to see the object form from a small black dim spot into a round ball of a flashing colored object.I felt no fear,very interested as to what it was and to why oit appears to form at the same time same place evening.Maybe a star coming out,but the surrounding stars are completely w/o any behaviours of the flashing balls of light and the stars donot flash,spin around,dip and dive across a small area of space at a very quick pace.I first began to see these object as a flash of light in the corner of my eyes.I was sooo concerned about the flashing of light in my eyes,i saw my eye care dr.Who told me my eyes were ok with a good eye exam.I didn not tell him i was seeing flashing balls of light in the night sky.I lost sight of the objects because the would become smaller and dimmer in the night sky until they were no long able to be seen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple round colored flashing balls of light appears singlely out of thr darkness,flashing in the  colors of re on top,gold white in the center and green blue on the bottom,as many as 5 noted seem to form around a single bright white light in the sw sky

content.detailedDescription: Looking at the full moon. when i noticed  the strange lights ina row. red white and blue lights as bright as the moon. see pic. thaught , i wish i had telescope,  but i'll try to get a pic. on this junk phone.The  lights didn't move at all that i noticed. watched for 1/2 hour , then went inside. went back out occasionally to see if they were still there. they were. don't know hoow long they were there. i have seen, i believe,did return,now i wait.
content.summary: Looking atfull moon, saw red, white and blue lights brightly lit below view of moon have pic.

content.detailedDescription: In 1975 0r 1976 i was in 2nd or 3rd grade,my elementary school class went on a class trip to smith memorial playground and playhouse.We boarded the buses and headed to the fairmount park section of the city.Smith playground has been around since the 1800's it has the world's largest wooden slide board.Our class arrived for the day's fun sliding the slide and having fun with other school kids that were there also on a class trip.Myself and some of my classmates became bored so we decided to make our own fun.We scaled a fence to another section of the playground,there we came upon a swimming pool area.In this new area we can see that the pool haven't been used in years there was so many leaves in the pool that it's color was dark green.We began throwing rocks in the pool until we again became bored,so we scaled another fence.This new area put us out in the park there was a pathway to our right,as we began to walk down pathway i heard a female voice from behind me say "stop children". when i looked back there was this "green lady" hanging from this tree,when she came out of the tree i can see that she had scaly skin like a lizard,her shin had a design pattern which covered her from top to bottom,as if her skin was also her clothes.She walked on 2 feet and she had a small slit for a mouth.When she spoke to us we can hear her in our heads,her mouth never opened or moved.We hot tailed it back over the fences and i have never been back.I can not remember all my classmates that was there.After 30yrs of questions i found 1 classmate that remember this incident,there were probably 5-6 of us.Also thru some research i found an article from the times daily-google news archive dated 10/6/1959 which describes an incident about a green lady chasing school children with a knife.This does not fit the description nor the same green lady that appeared to us.I witnessed something truly amazing and out of this world.I feel very blesses to have experience this and truly lucky that i can finally share my story with professional people instead of the non believers.
content.summary: A green being appeared before me and classmates

content.detailedDescription: Observed bright gold object moving west in the morning sky as sun was rising. it stood out over southern california. was not a plane or contrail. it was moving at a high altitude and speed. as i was pointing it out to my kids and pulling over we witnessed the 3rd object appear and seem to fall from the sky than the glowing contrail appeared. it looked like it was falling straight down and then it speed off to the west into the rising sun. it all lasted 4o minutes as we were driving back from the airport on the 405 freeway. i have pics of the 3rd object.
content.summary: One main object observed , than 2 more over 45 min.

content.detailedDescription:
Was my boyfriend's birthday and we were reunited with friends. we had been talking for a while on a terrace in a big house on the outskirts of the city. we looked at the stars talking about the stars and the universe, when suddenly we see a big enough star that was in a fixed position and began to move randomly. sometimes too fast or slow.
at times to "wave" from the top down. and accelerated. was a full moon night. the object is moved to the brightness of the moon and disappeared.
from the time we begin to see other errant objects, much like stars in the sky, and moving very strangely. my friends and i discard the idea that it was a plane, a helicopter or a satellite. it was definitely a ufo. after a while, my boyfriend and his friend went for a walk around the area. were approximately 3am. they went back to see a very similar object.
it was something very like a star. the distance to the object was great. he was very tall and was flashing like any astral object.
content.summary: Sighting of a ufo during starry night and full moon. resembling a star but with strange movements

content.detailedDescription: On may 20,2010 as i was driving home from a friends house i looked up at the sky and seen amber colored orb just floating in the sky. i pulled up my driveway and ran inside my house to grab my video camera ran back outside and began recording for 10 min i got a better look at it when i turned on the nightvision on my video camera it kept fadeing and fadeing until it disappeared.
content.summary: Driving home looked up and seen amber colored orb just floating inthe sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch. i looked to the southeast, and noticed a light in the sky. i thought it was an airplane. i watched for the blinking lights, but there was none. it was a glowing light that was reddish/yellow/orange. it traveled in a straight line to the east. it made no observable noise. it disappeared to the west of my location. total duration - about 20 seconds.
content.summary: Glowing light travelling from se to w, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This is the 2nd time i have observed this planet moving in extremely unnatural, and strange motions.  i know this will sound crazy and i wish i had woken up my husband, but i didn't. i want to state that i have witnessed multiple meteror showers over the previous 20 years.  i have spent many nights gazing up at the stars.  we live near several major airports and one in livermore, which is more suited to small aircraft.  we are also very close to the lawrence livemore lab and sandia labs.  this planet or star was not only twinkling, but was getting brighter,then dimmer, moving horizontally a little way then stopping, moving circular two times, moving lateral to right, stopping, then descending a little, all the movements seemed to be preceeded by a change in the brightness of the light.  two separate times small airplanes came into my field of vision, and it seemed that it would get noticeably smaller, less light being given off.  i also noticed a smaller star, sitting lower to the horizon moving somewhat.  it is the nearest star i can see with out the aide of a telescope.   it too would change in the amount of light it emitted, appearing larger at times, then as the small aircraft moved horizontally across my field of vision, it too would seem to react, almost shrinking so much that it almost disappeared.  it too was moving unnaturally, but not nearly so much as the larger and higher on the horizon planet/star. 
both times i observed this weird, unnatural movement it was after 11:15 pm,. i was looking out a bedroom window that faces north east. we live in a suburban bedroom community.  we have lived here for almost 30 years.  but i have only been borrowing my son's bedroom while he is away at college and we are remodeling master bedroom.  i am a happily married woman, just 53yearsold.  i know this sounds crazy and frankly i would love to learn that in reality i have been observing a satellite.  but if a genuine ufo thats o k too.
 i really saw this happen. can a satellite move in circular motion, get brighter, then dim within seconds?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watching stars out window, 2nd night it moved circular,horizontal,flashed

content.detailedDescription:
Close to midnight my wife and i were sitting in the living room watching tv on the computer when suddenly a bright focused beam of white light approx. twenty feet in diameter swept through the top of the tree in the neighbor's front yard, across the neighbor's driveway, over the top of her car and into our window, blinding us as we turned to look at it.  then it quickly swept back across the road and was gone.  
the whole thing happened in less than three seconds.  at first we thought it was a helicopter, so my wife turned our light off to get a better look out the window.  my wife opened the window and outside was silent, except for the crickets.  had it been a helicopter shining a light, it would have had to have been less than 200 ft above us and we would have heard it.  we looked out about 10 seconds after seeing the light when my eyes adjusted from the light.  there were no other lights in the air to indicate any sort of aircraft.  the light beam was very focused and bright.  we could not see the object it was coming from.  it was surprising how fast and bright it was but it did not light up the rest of the surrounding area, only where the beam was shining.  
it gave us goosebumps and made us feel extremely uneasy.  i have never seen a light like it.
content.summary: Bright beam through the window

content.detailedDescription: The object was stationary but it seemed to oscillate on itself. it sometimes ascended or descended, grew bigger (came closer?). all around, small other blues lights were flashing, stationary. then, the main object changed direction, waved like a leaf and suddenly vanished.
content.summary: Stationary object (blue/violet/white/yellow colours) oscillating on itself with smaller satellites flashing blue. suddenly vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Dog started barking intensely.

barking went on for 30 seconds

dog ran into the hallway to come alert me, was highly relieved when i responded

thinking it was a mountain lion< i looked outside. i saw nothing in the surrounding area horizontal to the house.

i looked out yhe window and saw bright object hanging in sky above my neighbor's cattle ranch. . opened door, no noise. 

extremely briht light, no aviation strobes. no engine noise.

startled, i retreated into house, went upstairs, where my wife was awakened by dog she said, 'that's not a star...  look at the two lights!"

i then realized that there was apparently a much smaller light to the side of the bigger one.

that small light then went out after 30 seconds and seemed to fly in a circle then into the bigger light..

the ger light seemed to be stationary... but slowly approaching.

big light was roughly a few thousand feet away and apparently closing on my location. perhaps 2000 feet to a mile in altitude above..

suddenly it 'blinked'  out and there was complete darkness.

extremely< extremely, bright light. turned off as if a switch was turned off. 

then totally black. no shape. no after glow.

no sound at all.

not a helicopter, not an airplane. not a ballon. not a blimp.


baffled.
content.summary: Bright light 5 minute duration. did not move, no noise. blinked out

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving back from working late at an office along gaines school road (from north to south) just after midnight on october 3rd, 2013, when i saw two slow-moving round white lights a few blocks away. i figured it was an airplane or something, but as we got closer it stopped moving entirely. so when we got alongside it, my husband pulled into a parking lot where a k-mart used to be (but is now a deserted parking lot, between two grocery stores). as we got closer, it seemed no bigger than a go-kart, with 3 bright blue-white lights forming a triangle. one of the lights appeared slightly dimmer than the other two. i rolled down the window of the car to get a better look. i could make out a dark gray triangle shape supporting the three lights. my husband pulled underneath it, and it was up, maybe 150 ft. in the air, but the instant we got under it, the object started to move north. at this point, we assumed it must be some kind of remote-controlled aircraft (with lights?) and looked for someone operating it as we drove. we saw no one. it began to move faster and we continued through the long strip mall drive following behind it. it moved steadily and continued to pick up speed. we lost sight of it when it went over the jittery joe's on barnett shoals rd., and by the time we got on the other side of the building, it was completely gone. it was heading in the direction from which we originally came. it was a clear and well lit night and we could see most of the sky from the road. we both felt stunned and very puzzled by what we had seen. a friend of ours reported seeing an identical flying object in size, shape, and movement on the westside of athens a few days later on october 5th, 2013 around 10:00 pm.
content.summary: Go cart sized triangle shaped craft with three bright blue-white lights hovered 150 ft above empty parking lot then flew north from south eastern athens, georgia
